docs.snippet: Zygmunt Bauman, one of the most prominent and prolific European sociologists of recent decades, has died at the age of 91. The Polish-born left-wing thinker's works explored the fluidity of identity in the modern world, the Holocaust, consumerism ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Zygmunt Bauman, one of the most prominent and prolific European sociologists of recent decades, has died at the age of 91. The Polish-born left-wing thinker's works explored the fluidity of identity in the modern world, the Holocaust, consumerism and globalization.

headline.main: Polish-Born Sociologist Zygmunt Bauman Dies in UK at Age 91
headline.print_headline: Polish-Born Sociologist Zygmunt Bauman Dies in UK at Age 91

docs.snippet: Pakistan's government said on Monday it was seeking to amend the constitution to keep special military courts for civilians charged with terrorism, days after the mandate expired for the secret courts that had been accused of fostering rights abus...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan's government said on Monday it was seeking to amend the constitution to keep special military courts for civilians charged with terrorism, days after the mandate expired for the secret courts that had been accused of fostering rights abuses.

docs.snippet: A prolonged oil slump that has tested Texas' economic resilience is now badly chewing away at the state budget, leaving a hole that could be as big as $6 billion just to maintain the status quo, a top Republican lawmaker said Monday....

docs.snippet: A bright and upbeat music video of Saudi women has rapidly spread across social media, viewed more than three million times since it was uploaded to YouTube two weeks ago. The video, which challenges the country's patriarchal culture, has prompted...
docs.lead_paragraph: A bright and upbeat music video of Saudi women has rapidly spread across social media, viewed more than three million times since it was uploaded to YouTube two weeks ago. The video, which challenges the country's patriarchal culture, has prompted debate over the role of women in Saudi society.

headline.main: Saudi Women Cause Stir in Music Video
